verses.content: Chun, LALPA chun Elija chu thli- vira vâna a zuk lâk ding lai chun Elija chu Elisa leh Gilgala inthawk chun an feh a.

Chun, Elija chun Elisa kuomah, “Hitaka hin lo um hri rawh, ka ngên che hi, LALPA chun Bethel chena fe dingin a mi tir a nih,” a ta. Elisa chun, “LALPA le nang a hringna sâlin ka hril a nih; um san naw tawp ka ti che,” a ta. Chuongchun, Bethela chun an fe thla ve ve tah a.

Chun, Bethel khuoa zâwlnei nau- pasal umhai chu Elisa kuomah an hung a, a kuomah, “Vawisûn hin i chunga hotu hi LALPAIN a lâk hmangpêk ding che a nih ti i hriet am?” an ta. Chun, ama chun, “Aw ka hriet, lo to ṭawk ṭawk unla,” a ta.

Chun, Elija chun, “Elisa, hitaka hin lo um phawt rawh, ka ngên che hi, LALPA chun Jeriko chena fe dingin a mi tir sih a,” a ta. Ama chun a kuom- ah, “LALPA hringna le nanga hring- na sâlin ka hril a nih, um san naw tawp ka ti che,” a ta. Chuongchun, Jeriko chen chun an zu fe tah a.

Chun, Jeriko khuoa zâwlnei nau- pasalhai chu Elisa kuomah an hung a, a kuomah, “Vawisûn hin i chunga hotu hi LALPAIN a lâk hmangpêk ding che a nih ti i hriet am?” an ta. Chun, ama chun, “Aw ka hriet, lo to ṭawk ṭawk unla,” a ta.

Chun, Elija chun a kuomah, “Hitaka hin lo um rawh, ka ngên che hi, LALPA chun Jordan vadung chena fe dingin a mi tir sih a,” a ta. Chun, ama chun, “LALPA hringna le nanga hringna sâlin ka hril a nih, um san naw tawp ka ti che,” a ta. Chuong- chun an pahni chun an fe pei ta a.
Chun, zâwlnei naupasalhai mi sâwmnga an fe veh a, hlataka hin an hmazâwnah an ngîr a, anni chu Jordan vadung panga chun an ngîr tah a.
Chun, Elija chun a puon chu a hlîp a, ân têl a, tui chu a vuok tah a, chuongchun, khingtieng khingtieng chun a lo inṭheh a, an pahni chun hnuoi hula chun an fe kai tah a.

Chun, an kai hnung chun Elija chun Elisa kuomah, “I kuoma in- thawka lâk hmang ka ni hma hin, i ta dingin ieng am thawpêk ka ti cheh a, mi hni rawh?” a ta. Chun, Elisa chun, “I thlarau chan lehni hi ka chungah um raw se, ka ngên che hi,” a ta.

Ama chun, “Thil intaktak i hni a ni chu, iengkhawm ni sienla, i kuoma inthawka lâk hmanga ka um lai i hmu chun, chuong ang chun i chung- ah um a tih, i mi hmu naw ruok chun chuong ang chu ni naw nih,” a ta.

Chun, an fe pei a, an la ṭawng zing laiin, ngai ta, mei sakawr taw- lailîr le mei sakawrhai a hung inlang a, chu chun anni chu an kâra tlain a ṭhe tah a; chun, Elija chu thlivira chun vânah a lâwn tah a.
Chun, Elisa chun a hmuh a, “Pa, Pa! Israel sakawr tawlailîr le sakawr chung chuong mihai!” tiin a khêk a.
Elija puon amaa inthawka hung tla chu a lâk a, a kîr a; Jordan vadung panga chun a ngîr tah a.

Chun, Elija puon amaa in- thawka tla chu a lâk a, “Elija Pathien LALPA chu khâwlai am a um a?” a tih a, tui chu a vuok a, chuongchun, khingtieng khingtieng chun tui chu an lo inṭhe tah a. Chun, Elisa chu râlkhing chu a kai tah a.

Chun, zâwlnei naupasalhai Jeriko khuoa umhaiin ama chu an lo hmu nâwk chun, “Elija thlarau kha Elisa chunga hin a um ta ngei el,” an tih a, ama chu tuok dingin an hung suok a, a hmaa chun hnuoi sikin an kûn a, chibai an bûk tâwl a.

Chun, anni chun a kuomah, “Ngai ta, tuhin pasal hrât i siehlaw- hai kuoma hin sâwmnga an um a, kan ngên che hi, anni chu tir la i hotupa chu inzawngtir rawh, ama chu LALPA thlarau chun lain, tlâng khaw laia manih, ruom khaw laia manih a lo inthlâk hlau rawi mawh,” an ta. Ama chun, “infetir lo ding,” a ta.
Ama chu inzak khawp raka an phût an phût hnunga chun ama chun, “Tir ta unla,” a ta. Chuongchun, mi sâwmnga chu an tir a, ni thum sûng an zawng a, nisienlakhawm, an hmu zo nawh a.
Chun, anni chu Jeriko khuoa a la châm sûng chun an hung tlung nâwk a, ama chun an kuomah, “Fe naw ro, ka ti hrim cheu a ni naw am a nih,” a lo tih a.

Chun, chu khawpuia mihai chun Elisa kuomah, “Ngai ta, kan ngên che hi, hi khaw um dân hi ân hawi hle a, kan pu hin i hmu ve zing a; nisienlakhawm, tui hi a ṭha nawh a, a ram khawm hi a takchang naw a nih,” an ta.
Chun, ama chun an kuomah, “Tuiûm thar mi hung lapêk unla, a sûngah chi hung sie ro,” a ta. Chun, an hung lâkpêk tah a.

Chun, tuikhur hnârahai chun a hang feh a, chutaka chun chi chu a phul a, “LALPA chun hieng hin a tih, ‘Hi tui hi ka sukhnik tah a, tuta inthawk chu thina hrim hrim le, takchangnawna po po ka sukbo tah,’ tiin,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Elisa thuhril ang ngei chun tu chen hin tuihai chu sukṭhat an ni tah a.

Chun, chutaka inthawk chun Bethelah a hang feh a, chun, lampuia a fe lai chun khawpuia inthawk hin naupang chitê tehai chu an hung suok a, ama chu an nuisan a, a kuomah, “Hang fe rawh, nang lusîp kawlpa,” an ta.

Chun, a hnungtieng a hei en chun anni chu a hmu tah a, chuong- chun, LALPA hmingin anni chu ṭawngsie ân phur tah a. Chun, ram- hnuoia inthawk chun savawmpui pa- hni an hung suok a, anni laia nau- pang sâwmli le pahni chu an hung sê tah a.
Chun, chutaka inthawk chun Karmel tlângah a feh a, chutaka inthawk chun Samari ramah a kîr nâwk tah a.
